subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
organizations: Confederation of North, Central American and Caribbean Association Football (CONCACAF)
lead_paragraph: Jack Warner, a special adviser to Trinidad’s soccer federation, is clearly being wooed by English officials, who are seeking support for their bid to host the 2018 World Cup.
snippet: Jack Warner, a special adviser to Trinidad’s soccer federation, is clearly being wooed by English officials, who are seeking support for their bid to host the 2018 World Cup.
